==============
decorator-args
==============

Optional/required/keyword-only decorator arguments made easy.

Usage
=====


Installation
------------

.. code-block:: sh

    pip install decorator-args

Alternatively you can download the zipped library from https://pypi.python.org/pypi/decorator-args
